# MetaMask developer documentation

These links contain LLM-readable files following the llmstxt.org standard, for each product section:

- MetaMask SDK
  - https://docs.metamask.io/llms-sdk.txt - Documentation links for MetaMask SDK
  - https://docs.metamask.io/llms-sdk-full.txt - Complete documentation for MetaMask SDK

- Wallet API
  - https://docs.metamask.io/llms-wallet.txt - Documentation links for Wallet API
  - https://docs.metamask.io/llms-wallet-full.txt - Complete documentation for Wallet API

- Embedded Wallets
  - https://docs.metamask.io/llms-embedded-wallets.txt - Documentation links for Embedded Wallets
  - https://docs.metamask.io/llms-embedded-wallets-full.txt - Complete documentation for Embedded Wallets

- Smart Accounts Kit
  - https://docs.metamask.io/llms-smart-accounts-kit.txt - Documentation links for Smart Accounts Kit
  - https://docs.metamask.io/llms-smart-accounts-kit-full.txt - Complete documentation for Smart Accounts Kit

- Services
  - https://docs.metamask.io/llms-services.txt - Documentation links for MetaMask services
  - https://docs.metamask.io/llms-services-full.txt - Complete documentation for MetaMask services

- Developer dashboard
  - https://docs.metamask.io/llms-dashboard.txt - Documentation links for MetaMask Developer dashboard
  - https://docs.metamask.io/llms-dashboard-full.txt - Complete documentation for MetaMask Developer dashboard

- Snaps
  - https://docs.metamask.io/llms-snaps.txt - Documentation links for Snaps
  - https://docs.metamask.io/llms-snaps-full.txt - Complete documentation for Snaps
  
- Tutorials
  - https://docs.metamask.io/llms-tutorials.txt - Documentation links for MetaMask tutorials
  - https://docs.metamask.io/llms-tutorials-full.txt - Complete documentation for MetaMask tutorials
